summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley between Twenty-fourth Avenue and Twenty-fifth Avenue, from East Pine Street to East Howell Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 488 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
